website_summaries.verdict: A great overall wash and wax kit you can buy without the need for water.
pros: The car wash waterless mix offers a great amount of protection from UV damage
The wax can be used on a number of different surface types such as a car, boat, RV, motorcycle, garage floor and equipment, home and office
Wax applies with minimal effort and application
cons: The shine of the included wax does not last as long as automotive-specific options

customer_reviews.title: Great on everything!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this as I have detailed cars for a few years and am super picky about what products I use. I used this after I ran my car through a quick wash. The wash didn't do a good job, but with very little effort, my car looked perfect. I just sprayed and wiped with one rag, then buffed with another. In 15 minutes and with very little chemical and effort my car looked excellent. It also works very well on windows, door jams, wheels, and the interior of your car! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K

customer_reviews.title: MY BMW APPROVES THIS MESSAGE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews on the things I buy here, but for this one; I just couldn't resist sharing what I think of this MAGICAL substance. If you love your vehicle as much as I love my BMW, you MUST have this in your car or garage at all times. I seriously hadn't seen my car this clean since I bought it 3 years ago and trust me I've tried brands after brands. And the fact that you need NO WATER it's unbeatable!! No more trips to the car wash for me! Thank you Aero Cosmetics you are the real MVP!!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: for me this product did nothing
customer_reviews.text: We Just bought a 2017 class C with only 12,000 miles. It had black lines and wasn't shinny. I just got this product in and used it. didn't take black lines out at all. Also didn't make is shinny. a friend of mine also give me the product he uses. called GEL GLOSS RV Cleaner & Wax. This product took black lines out and made it shinny. I don't understand how this got 5 stars. maybe everyone had a brand New RV. SO with that. If you have a faded Camper. In my opinion this isn't the product for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrible soap it’s as thin as water and after washing my car one time it removed all wax that was previously on my car. Even though this says it contains wax it is quite the opposite it barely even has soap. I want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: It does nothing!
customer_reviews.text: How in the world does this product have so many great reviews? It did nothing. I used it as specified, and NOTHING! It didn't even remove some simple water/soap marks from a recent wash. Man have I been fooled! I definitely want my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Product
customer_reviews.text: Ist time using this was using fw1 It looks great maybe a little less effort with this I dont know if its better ,but cheaper for sure..for same or better result ! I have a 'Big' Car...Challenger Hellcat and used only about 1/4 of sprayer bottle
customer_reviews.author: Gary F. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good at removing dirt and grime, would give 5 stars but the product is a little harder to buff clean than some other products out there. But for the price it's an excellent product. To make it easier to buff clean, make sure you use a very damp microfiber to apply and dry immediately with a clean dry microfiber. I've found going over the vehicle once without buffing with a dry microfiber, then going over it again with a diluted 1:1 mixture of wax/distilled water makes it very easy to get a glossy finish.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money this product doesn't work it's total crap
customer_reviews.text: So In fairness I decided to try it again follow the directions right to the T this stuff did nothing wouldn't even remove a water stain the shine was horrible and for the amount of money you pay for this the product it should work like they say it does well in my opinion it doesn't I can't return it so I'm giving other people a heads up don't get this stuff it's total garbage
customer_reviews.author: Paul B

customer_reviews.title: There are no short cuts in life without a long term cost.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could say this is the holy grail of waterless car wash but it is not. It does the job and it is a pretty okay job, but nothing that will make you say "OMG." That is what we want right, somethat make you say OMG, how is this even possible? Application is easy and straight forward....LISTEN if you have visible dirt on your car and use this product on it "you will scratch your surface." The only way to properly wash a car is to remove visble dirt first. Just a warning.
customer_reviews.author: Typos

customer_reviews.title: Harder to dry/wipe clean, but great results
customer_reviews.text: The finished results are good but it took more work to get clean and dry than other waterless wash products. After wiping down there was a oily layer left behind almost like I sprayed Pam cooking spray on it. I used the dry towels provided and they were not saturated after wiping down, so I am confident that was not the issue. I wiped it down again with more fresh towels and then it looked great. With the McGuires waterless wash product I only had to wipe it down once and it was less work. But I will say this stuff leaves a more polished look so its a trade off.
customer_reviews.author: MagicMike

customer_reviews.title: I like the waterless washing
customer_reviews.text: I like the waterless washing. The wax, however doesn't seem to last as long. I put it on my new car and the dust seemed to bake on rather than to dust off. I will continue to use it, but will try adding another wax over the top of it to see if that works.
customer_reviews.author: Snorvelous Wubbins

customer_reviews.title: Effortless and Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes. I ordered and received my kit yesterday, watched their how-to video last night, and just completed my first waterless wax after work in the parking lot. Took me just over 40 minutes to touch every surface on my Taurus SHO. This stuff took off bugs from my bumper that have survived four washes and two specific attempts to just clean the bugs. I am deeply impressed with the simplicity and results. Before I had finished half the car two coworkers had taken pictures of the bottle so they could go home and order it. My car used approximately 97% of the small spray bottle. I had enough left over to clean the windows on a coworkers truck.
customer_reviews.author: S. Blaker

customer_reviews.title: Try again
customer_reviews.text: Not too sure I would buy again.. leaves alot of haze. I have an Audi R8/ Mercedes c300/ BMW classic and a Nissan race car. Before I use something on my top tier car, it's gotta make it through the gauntlet of cars I own. This does not pass. I've used other products that clean, protect, and smell a whole lot better. I tried this for the price, and just does not seem worth it.
customer_reviews.author: judd

customer_reviews.title: Stellar
customer_reviews.text: Worked like a charm. I followed these steps to clean car: * First rinse with clean water using garden hose. * Spray soap solution and wait for a few mins to allow soap penetrate dirt. * Wash with clean water spray with garden hose and make sure dirt is gone. * Do NOT wipe out the water yet. Spray this solution covering one area at a time. * Wipe out the water and solution mix with the given napkins. The car looks all shiny and new now. I am in love with this already. Definitely recommended and will order again when required.
customer_reviews.author: Vidushi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent waterless car wash cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I'm soooo wowed by this waterless car wash kit and it easy to use application. It leaves no streaks on the Windows as well. It performed way above my expectations. This kit would leave your car spotless with that new car shine. I highly recommend the purchasing of this car wash kit and it get 5 stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: JFamily

customer_reviews.title: Over Hyped.
customer_reviews.text: Pros; does the job. Decent shine. Smells great. 1) I've used better waterless sprays for more or less the same$. Don't see any noticeable improvement on my matte black motorcycle or my gloss black car. Takes a little more elbow grease then say meguairs. 2) the spray bottle cap loves to screw off and spill everywhere! No matter how tight you close it 4) takes a lot of product to really clean. 3) The microfiber towels are too thin. Don't see much use coming out of em. Overall I am satisfied. My ride is clean and sharp at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Zam Zam

customer_reviews.title: Nothing magical
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what is so great about this stuff. I feel it's not much different than any quality detailing spray. I tried it as a replacement for the sponge and hose but am afraid of getting micro scratches from dragging dirt across the paint. It's very watery and tends to run down all vertical panels. Again give it a try but I'm really not sure I believe in the hype. Is it a good product? I guess. Is it a great product? No far from it IMHO
customer_reviews.author: gnatsum

customer_reviews.title: A Liquid magnet for dirt film  in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product last year and used it a few times I bought a gallon and a spray combination small bottle that came with it this product doesn’t work I don’t know what’s in it but it seemed like it mess my car finished up and it attracts dirt to it even more The dirt film Sticks thicker On your car if you already have a good wax on it don’t put this on there to mess it up I wish I could return this gallon an about 10 ounces of the 16 ounce bottle I have left for a refund
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product leaves residue that is a dust magnet.
customer_reviews.text: Application went okay but in the days following I became frustrated with how this collected dust. Couldn’t wait to get to the car wash. I applied to a 2019 Ram pickup. I can’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Save a few bucks having quality time with your car.
customer_reviews.text: I really like that washing my car this way costs a fraction of a normal car wash. It leaves my 2020 Corolla SE looking glossy, like new. It's pretty good at getting dried bee poop off the paint but sometimes it does take a little elbow grease to do so. My issue is it does take about 12 ounces (3/4 of the spray bottle) of my 16 ounce bottle to fully wash my car. I've read reviews of people washing trucks with half the bottle! Don't know how they do it. Also, it can't seem to get water spots off completely. I have to look close but after several sprays and wipes, they're still there.
customer_reviews.author: Mark0

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: I bought The Wet or Waterless Car Wash Wax Kit and a container of Meguiars Gold Class Paste Wax and did a side by side waxing on my 3 year old BMW. The WW wax was a much faster job, but the Meguiars had a more slippery feel and cost one third as much as WW Car wash Wax kit. Both gave a similar good shine. My conclusion is if you are time constrained and want a quick shine, use the WW wash/Wax. If you are interested in a more durable and slippery wax job, use a paste wax and spend more time. I will stay with the paste wax.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks! I'm really impressed with it. I live in San Diego where it is dusty most of the time. It takes me about 15 minutes from start to finish for a Toyota Rav 4 and afterwards it looks great! Keeps it's shine too for about 2 weeks. Easy to use and puts a nice finish. Great on windows and rims as well. I make it a family affair as the kids like to spray on for me and I put on than dry off. I can do 2 vehicles in 30 minutes and cars look like a professional detail job every time.
customer_reviews.author: BH_amazon

customer_reviews.title: Cleans even the most bird-pooped on of cars!
customer_reviews.text: I had a very dirty car with lots of bird poop all over it and I had my doubts whether this stuff would do the job. Well, it did and I'm including pictures to prove it. My car is a 2012 and this product shined it up like a newer model. Since my car was so dirty,I used about half the bottle and I used all of the terry cloth towels. I wished I had more because I needed them. I cleaned the inside of my car as well and it did a stellar job leaving no streaks on the windows. The product has a nice scent. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cr

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The first time we applied this it went on a bit thick, but it apparently built a beautiful barrier, because the second and subsequent times it has gone on very smoothly. The rain sheets right off the finish now, and most of the time we just apply a thin coat. The bugs come off the grill so much easier as well. We have even put a coat of this product on our house windows. I don't know how this works, and I was really skeptical at first, but it has made a believer in me. I highly recommend this product. BTW, I did not receive a promo or remuneration of any kind for this review.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your energy on waxes that require drying before buffing
customer_reviews.text: I've been hand waxing vehicles and RVs/trailers for 42 years. Never have I used something so easy to apply and buff. I used the Wash Wax All along with the "Polish All" on a painted fiberglass travel trailer and was done in about a quarter of the time it would have taken me with the traditional apply and let dry wax. The Polish All did a great job of removing the oxidation and is removed before drying. I applied the Polish All and then removed it by spraying a little Wash Wax All over the same area and then buffed. No major elbow grease required and very quick. Where has this been all of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: A little extra work, but saves on water!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to be more water conscious living in SoCal, and this does the job. Some of my friends who live in apartment complexes who dont have easy access to a water hose have loved this too. I will say though, it takes longer for me to clean my car the waterless way as opposed to the traditional hose method. Also, when doing the windows, make sure you use 2 towels. the damp towel should be the 1st pass with the spray, then IMMEDIATELY after pass the dry towel to make sure you dont get any streaks. Took me about 3 tries to get it right, but once you do, its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who want to save on water and for touch ups
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I’m terrible at washing my car. This stuff got almost all the dirt and dust off that drive thru car washes couldn’t. I was happy to see her sparkle again. The only places I trouble getting the caked on gunk off was my bumpers because they are made out of different material. They still cleaned it, but not as sparkly as the rest of her. I can deal with that. I’m still happy with my purchase and I used about half of the spray bottle my first go. I like that you can use it waterless and it works! The reusable towels are great too.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: My 82 year old father recommended Aero Cosmetics to me. I was impressed when I used it. Just spray it on and wipe it off to both wash and wax. Most car spray waxes or detailers leave a film that needs to be buffed out. Aero Cosmetics does not, and the shine is great. Please note: if your Car, Boat or Motorhome is heavily soiled, you should wash it first to get the heavy dirt off. I use Aero Cosmetics between washes or when the car is lightly dirty. You will be pleased with how it works. I got the Wash and Wax, Polish and Bug removing cleaning pad.l
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not for black or dark color cars
customer_reviews.text: I really want to like this... but it streaks and smears like crazy on my 2012 dark gray Corvette. At first I assumed it was because the panels were warm so I tried it again today when it's cloudy out. Same visible smears. I could actually see my microfiber towels move the smears around as I was wiping it down. I tried it on my 2017 light gray civic and it's much less visible. Overall it cleans well, smells well, and has a nice slick finish when done, but I wouldn't recommend it for black or dark color cars.
customer_reviews.author: Teyu

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, It goes on pretty easy and has a brilliant shine that lasts. Only drawback is you have to time it perfectly far as wiping the product to a shine. If you wait too long it can become sticky & leave a haze.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this stuff is fantastic. Received yesterday and proceeded to do all 4 of my vehicles. 2 were already squeaky clean and 1 had 2 days of pollen/dust and the last was moderately filthy. I was fairly liberal on application on the filthy car and was careful to note if there was any clear coat scratching under my bright LED garage lights...nothing. This stuff is smooth as a baby's butt and the shine is incredible! I was procrastinating for almost 1.5 years and finally went for it and I gotta say, this is probably the only detail/waterless wash spray I will ever use again!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good But Doesn't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a pretty impressive product. Truly a one stop shop for getting your car clean with or without water. If completely waterless, you'll just have to use a little more solution. If you've rinsed or done a traditional car wash beforehand, you'll use less solution. In either case, this solution leaves a nice shine on your vehicle and I believe it's worth it. However, one must be aware that the shine it imparts is not long lasting. It's gone in a week or two max depending on the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Say goodbye to the carwash
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. It is designed for airplanes and boats and as such it has a much higher quality than products made for cars. I started using it to wash my car instead of going to a carwash and so far the results are impressive. After one application two months ago, my car still looks the same. I applied some on my headlights to protect them from hazing and so far so good. If you like to take care of your car on your own and want to save water, there is no better product.
customer_reviews.author: W. Sisco

customer_reviews.title: Splish Splash my car is loving this bath...
customer_reviews.text: I used it at Saturday and its still holding strong(bout 7 days).Very Easy to use but be sure to switch to a new towel of the towek you are using gets dirty. Tried to wash 2 cars w one batch if mix and water and one rag. Forst car came out great hit second car didnt fair as well. But i guess that's life,isnt it? Can't always expect a BOGO situation.
customer_reviews.author: BilboSHAGGEMS

customer_reviews.title: This product is on point!
customer_reviews.text: It a great product! I paid so much for a product called F11...I paid $79 plus taxes for F11, which included a 16 oz bottle, a 1 oz travel size bottle and two Microsoft clothes...I paid half of that for the Wet or Waterless Carwash and got so much more, for a product that is just as good... Included was one gallon, a 16 oz bottle of product and 4 high quality Microsoft clothes...I am not knocking F11, but Wet or Waterless Carwash is just as good of a product and you get so much more for your money...I highly recommend this product... Very easy to apply and take off and the results are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Mason

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF IS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I have used many products but i used this on my 2 cars black and silver and stainless steel kitchen appliances and man it is awesome... they are still glowing... and for some reason the birds dont crap on the car as much....not sure why...nothing has changed but the cats don't climb on the hood or the car.. maybe its slippery or Something Infra red reflection...but it works for me..... and it's been over a week including 2 rain day... and still has a great shine..
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie F.

customer_reviews.title: Just wow....
customer_reviews.text: I used this kit to freshen up my car after winter storage. Spritz a fender, wipe it around with a damp microfibre cloth, and dry with a dry cloth. Repeat for whole car. Done in 30 minutes, my arms were still alive, and the car had a shine that rivaled an 'old fashioned' paste wax shine! It did a great job of removing/hiding old swirls on the black paint, and the car is SO shiny smooth that the car cover won't stay on it - it keeps sliding off!!! I love this stuff. HIGHLY recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Mitzdawg

customer_reviews.title: Very good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have newer model cars so I try to take care of them and keep them clean. This stuff is fantastic. I use it in my power-washer attachment and it really does the trick. Once I get a nice coat of cleaner on, I rinse it off, then towel dry completely. Then I go back over and touch it up with the spray bottle and a few of the towels that come with the kit. It's obviously not smooth like the buffed-in auto wax, but then again I'm not spending 3 hours waxing my car once a month. I generally wash, dry, and touch-up once per week and it definitely keeps them looking shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Scott France

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product didn't meet the hype about it. I am disappointed. I washed my truck with a good quality car wash detergent, dried it, then applied the Aero Wash Wax exactly according to directions. It didn't remove any water spots or light surface stains. The shine was ok but not what I was expecting. This truck is well cared for too. It's cleaned at least twice a month so it's not like it is a dirt box. I'll go back to good old fashion paste wax.
customer_reviews.author: P. Edgar

customer_reviews.title: WET OR WATERLESS
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this wet & waterless product .......tired of not making to the carwash or waiting long lines. This is a great product to use just spray an area use the Microsoft clothes which comes with the product. wipe it down move on to another area until you are done. When you see the finish its like you had came from a carwash........you can save a lot of money use this product without going to the carwash. I would recommend this product and all their other products
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It is first time I use this type of thing. It took around 2hours to clean (including dead bugs with wd40) one car and another hour for other (smaller) car. And they weren't that dirty. I wonder how other people wash in 15minutes... Anyways, car looks great after this. I used around one spray bottle for each car, so the pack will be enough for another 5-6 car washes. Towels, on other hand, look like will need to be replaced sooner as I already washed them twice with chemical guys towel detergent and one of 4 is already severely dirty, other 3 looks OK, for now...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My vehicles haven't seen inside of a carwash since dicovering this kit!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! People asking, how do keep my cars always clean :), so I refer them here for purchase a explain how to use it properly. Why I do is wash my towels and then use them straight out of the washer just slightly wet. Gently spray surfaces a wipe right away. If bugs are present, I'll soak them first few times. My 1st kit lasted me about 6 months for 2 vehicles always clean and 3rd only every few weeks. Obviously if you have solids/dirt/mud, rinse your car first.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: How did I not know about this stuff sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I am old and I didn't know about waterless washing until a month or two ago...this stuff is way better than water washing and faster too (except for rims and wheels maybe?). I did my whole car in about 35 minutes and it looked great, like I just waxed it (I did!) and no streaks. All one has to do is a separate load of the micro fiber towels in the washing machine...not a big deal. No more water washes for me ever. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Min

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the waterless car wash, but I am extremely glad I tried this product. It is easy to apply and remove, and it leaves a nice slick, but not slippery sheen. It is also a plus that has a nice Hawaiian coconut he sent. I have used it on the car body, the windows, my and my targa top as well as my wheels, and it does not disappoint. I am pleasantly surprised by this product. Wash and Wax All is totally awesome. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: DLL

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously easy with amazing results.
customer_reviews.text: This product goes on so easily, polished to a glass shine, and lasts longer than carnauba wax. The photo shows application half done on the black roof of my car. Amazingly simple way of cleaning the car. And, best of all, when the car gets dirty, you simply wipe away the dirt. No need to wash the car with water. I use a large car duster (available on Amazon of course) to quickly clean up the car. Quick, inexpensive and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: JimmyJoeS

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Easy To Use
customer_reviews.text: This is a water based, polymer wax product that is super easy to use. The key is to use soft microfiber cloths to do the job. Follow the simple instructions and you can't go wrong. And a little goes a very long way. The stuff may be $28/gal, but it doesn't take much at all. A little more than a pint to treat my 32' camper. It was originally developed for aircraft, and it works great on my RV and I'm trying it on my truck. This is really good stuff. You may never take your car to the carwash again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fraser

customer_reviews.title: It leaves an awesome shine
customer_reviews.text: It really works. I used it as soon as it arrived because my black colored car was beginning to look white. It had rain droplets on it before hand so I'm going to say that I applied on to a wet car. I used one of the supplied rags to wipe it on and the others to dry. It left my car clean and shiny. I love the idea of not having to use water and I will be purchasing more in the near future. I would highly recommend this product to those who don't really wish to spend much time washing their car. It's simple and quick.
customer_reviews.author: Sissy

customer_reviews.title: It works but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my motorcycle, got to say I have used better wash and wax products. It cleans and shines but with allot of effort to get rid of the bugs every time you use it. It also seems to leave marks in the finish (you can tell what way you polished in the sun). Overall it's ok for a basic waterless wash & wax, if you don't want to spend the money for the good stuff this will give you a basic wash and shine. I'm gonna use the whole dang gallon (I'm cheap and it's almost gone) but once gone I will be going with something I hope is better!
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Great shine, easy to use.  Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. I've used it both wet and dry. When dry, its gets all the dirt and grime off of the car. Sometimes there are areas with heavy dirt where you have to use more product. The shine is very good. But when used wet, the shine is absolutely amazing. I couldn't get over the level of gloss. This product is also easy to use, and there's no problem with residue or haze, even on our black car. You just have to make sure you buff lightly until it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: C Brown

customer_reviews.title: Holly cow, I'm a believer now.
customer_reviews.text: Makes it so easy to clean my rv, truck, van and boat. I love having a clean washed vehicle, but just don't have the time or the desire to use that much water. Even more importantly I hate starting a wash for fear of water spotting. Or with the RV a lot of parks don't like you washing your rv at the park and I never have time at home. This solved the problem for me and my stuff is looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Connell

customer_reviews.title: Wash Wax All - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was applied to the surface of a clean motor home. The produce was easy to use - spray it on, let set for 30 seconds, and wipe off - good. I had put this on next to a section I had done with a Nu-Car auto polish. The Nu-Car section had deeper slicker finish. Re applying the Wash Wax All did not add to the level of polish. I was hoping to get away from heavy application and removal, but I guess not.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Rodgers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Simply The BEST
customer_reviews.text: Recently I took 4 days off of work and Ceramic Coated my 2018 Dodge Scat Pack. It's all in the preparation, anyway for touch ups after a full wash/dry, you will not find a better product that this. It keeps that mirror finish going after you have performed a full wash/dry for days. Prevents you from having to wash/dry your car once a week. Of course this is assuming your not driving through puddles of mud. Great product, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best spray wash/wax/detailer that I have ever used. And I have tried plenty of things. I mainly use this on my Harley either after or before a ride. Very easy to spray on and wipe off. It seems like it actually repels some dust, as it appears that my Harley is not as dirty after a ride when using this stuff. I saw some reviews where people complained about the spray bottle, but mine works great and it gives a nice mist. For all that you get (Gallon of fluid, spray bottle that comes full and 3 microfiber towels - this is really a nice value!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S Zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: I don't get it.
customer_reviews.text: Yea you spray and wipe with a cloth and dust comes off. Shrug. I guess it is more gentle than windex, but don't get this stuff on your windows... streaks galore. So far I have not found anything too special about this product.
customer_reviews.author: boeyc15

customer_reviews.title: amazing stuff
customer_reviews.text: So as an RV full timer newbie, I could not figure out how the other RVers kept their rigs so shiny and nice. One day the wife and I were walking thru the RV park and a guy was out washing his rig--but without water. And his rig was shiny! So I stopped and asked him his secret. He showed me this stuff. I bought some and BEHOLD! I too have a shiny rig now. It's easy to put on, and leaves a slick, shiny surface.
customer_reviews.author: RV Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good! Car hasn’t been washed for several months. Used 1 water bucket for the entire car and maybe 4–6 oz of the spray bottle. Now it’s nice and shiny again. Just a heads up. It doesn’t take sap, bugs, or dried hard water spots off, but it doesn’t claim to. Very happy with the results and the process (no water hose, no water hitting the car next to mine). I would buy it again and would recommend this to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed for the $
customer_reviews.text: Ok..so not exactly sure how to explain this product. Expensive if used as a waterless wash and honestly haven't noticed any difference of vehicles being any shinier, or easier to clean from the less expensive products my son and I have been using. Followed instructions on how to use(although it's not rocket science), but not sure I can recommend because there are cheaper alternatives out there. Have used this product on a Honda Goldwing(red). Harley Ultra Classic(red). Chevy Silverado(black) Dodge Avenger(blue) and Audi A4. (gray).,.None show any noticeable difference rain or shine .Just my two cents from a blue collar guy who takes pride in the rides.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this kit to clean and protect our RV. My husband had had health problems, so our RV sat for over a year before we could wash it and take care of the outside. We used this with the waterless instructions, and I couldn't believe how well it worked! With a little elbow grease, it took off all of the stuck on bugs that had been frying in the sun for a year, as well as the road grime and dirt. I even used it on the exterior windows. Wow! I wish I had taken pictures of the before and after!! We will use this product from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Nana G

customer_reviews.title: Best fit for weekend enthusiast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try as a waterless car wash at my detail shop. It works good but it won't take most contaminants off the surface. It kind of coats the surface in wax which has decent hydrophobic properties. It is good for a weekend enthusiast but i won't recommend to use it as professionally. It does last for a month under normal conditions and is fairly easy to remove chemically.
customer_reviews.author: Shaft

customer_reviews.title: Works for waterless wash
customer_reviews.text: Can't wash my car at home (no access to water) and the coin op is 20 minutes away. I find that if you are in this situation and don't want to deal with two-bucket washing then this is a great alternative. It takes about 20-30 minutes with the two towel method in the description. No scratches on my car this way, uses about half the spray bottle for the whole car. I try to get the car washed this way every 1-1.5 weeks so the dust doesn't pile on, otherwise you will scratch the car if there is too much grit.
customer_reviews.author: Acyl

customer_reviews.title: love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second year of using this product across 4 vehicles and a 37' camper. The camper gets it twice a year, spring/fall, and the vehicles get it every couple months. For the vehicles, I'll run them through the cheap wash about a mile from my house then spend the next few hours getting every nook and cranny with this product. For the camper, I'll wash it with car wash soap with a brush and mitt, then I'll use this stuff for all surfaces, except the roof. I've been very pleased with the results (shine and water beading) and how long this product lasts. I'm still on the first gallon batch i bought in Aug 2017!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Results!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for my ‘05 Goldwing. Followed the directions for waterless wash wax. The results are astonishing!! Took me about 15 minutes to do my whole bike! Easy peazy!!!!!! Excellent product! I found that 4 towels the kit comes with is barely enough due to I like dry microfiber for polishing so I went on their website and ordered 8 more. It didn’t take but a couple ounces if that to do the bike so for the money and what you get it’s well worth the money and should last a long time. Will definitely buy again and highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dietz

customer_reviews.title: I was very skeptical of this, but it really is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2013 Honda Accord, never waxed it a day in my life. My paint became smooth, was beyond easy too use and it smells delicious! I posted a video showing the result after applying following the directions. Right side (passengers) does not have the product, it is how the entire car is. Left side (drivers) is after one application. I could no longer set the bottle on my trunk, it slid right off. Pretty cool to me!
customer_reviews.author: B3nault

customer_reviews.title: Most Amazing Wax I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: I own two motorcycles and a truck I keep looking immaculate so I've tried and used a list of products. I needed a UV protectant wax and found this kit. All I can say is WOW!!! Seems too good to be true in terms of ease of use, results, and protection provided. I can coat my entire truck in 30 min and it looks like I spent hours on it. The dirt/dust comes off easy (it has anti-stick/anti-static properties) and just a damp microfiber over the finish makes it look like I polished it again. All the positive reviews are telling you to buy this stuff. A little goes a long way! I'm a lifetime customer now.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Makes paint very slick!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I always wondered how planes stayed so shiny and it all makes sense now. You do do not need to use very much. Like 10-12 sprays can do your entire car. You absolutely can see and FEEL the difference. When first applying, you will feel the friction of the microfiber rag against the paint, but after a swipe or two over the area, you'll notice that the friction is gone and your rag is gliding across the paint like ice. That's actually how I test areas if I'm not sure if I applied it in a certain spot yet. I could not be more impressed or satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Tricky stuff
customer_reviews.text: This product is very tricky, i used it on my white maserati. I think in order to see results you will need to let it sit in after you apply it. Also do NOT use it under any type of sun. Once it drys into the paint its over for that. You might as well start over again and use a clay bar to remove the spots left behind. I wet the car firt before i applied any washwax. You would be a fool to apply this with out doing so.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had zero luck with this stuff. Perhaps I got a bad batch. I’ve tried waterless. I’ve tried after washing. I’ve tried it every way and I get the same results... nothing but very very mild attempts at water beading that typically doesn’t last through a day of rain. Very disappointed in this stuff. Not sure how so many others found success with it. Perhaps a placebo effect.
customer_reviews.author: Infandous Ktenology

customer_reviews.title: Not a big fan
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a big fan. If you don’t dry it completely (as directed), it leaves little spots everywhere. It does help shed water, but that’s the best I can say. What this product taught me more than anything is that you really can wash your car with just water and a rag.
customer_reviews.author: huejass

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use, brilliant shine!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first. It had rained and my new car had road grime on it. I sprayed front fender first and let it set for a couple minutes. I took their clean towel and lightly removed solution turning over the towel on each pass. Then, I lightly sprayed a second coat and used a clean towel. I couldn’t believe my eyes. The paint was dazzling to me. Not a scratch to be found. I love it for its ease of use and brilliant shine. A Must Have Product!
customer_reviews.author: LPD911retired

customer_reviews.title: Great Value with the included gallon, a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is phenomenal! I have used many waxes in the past with great results especially meguiars. But this product is great as a drying agent and as a waterless wash. I literally have wiped down my whole house after seeing how it left our cars. I apply it a couple times a month so longetivity isn't a concern but I seen beading a month after an application so I know the product will at least last that long in between applications.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckj412

customer_reviews.title: Really nice kit that includes 4 microfiber towels and a bug ...
customer_reviews.text: Really nice kit that includes 4 microfiber towels and a bug scrubber. Unless you have five or more cars, it's nice to not have to go and buy a 24 pack of microfiber towels. The spray works well, has a nice smell without being overpowering, and is water-based so I'm not worried about holding the microfiber. The streaks that you might not see the first time around go away if you just wipe it again with a clean towel. And the customer service really is top notch...
customer_reviews.author: silly goose

customer_reviews.title: Wet or Waterless Car Wash Wax
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a kit to "wash" my car the old fashioned way -- with water. Then I came across waterless details, and thought I'd try it after researching this one after researching different brands. This one seemed to have the least amount of effort and the fact that I could use it for everything was even better. I It waxes as you clean. I have detailed my small crossover SUV twice and am very happy with the outcome. I should be able to do 20+ details out of the kit. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: RV heaven
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this on the recommendation of a fellow RV owner. This worked great in helping to remove some of the stuck on bugs and road grime once we came off a long road trip. I have since used it on our Jeep and have found that the bugs are not "sticking" as they would prior to use. Provides a nice moisture barrier for rain and we've found that all dirt comes off much easier once you've used this product and rewash the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for condo living
customer_reviews.text: I live in a condo where a car wash port is non existant so I decided to try this wash/wax solution since my car detail shop is closed indefinitely. WOW! The city grime came off easily and after wiping/buffing w/ a dry cloth my car looks amazing. I have a 2 door bmw and used probably 1/8th of the bottle. I think the gallon and 16 oz bottle will last me for years. Love this product!! Highly recom.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my brand new GMC Sierra 3500. It was time for it's first cleaning and I wanted something to help keep it cleaner over time. Wax was the first plan. After reading the reviews here, I wanted to give it a try. Wow, I'm happy I did! This cleaned up light dust and dirt without any effort, while staying waterless. Did the entire exterior except the tires. Used two towels, I see I should of used more. Light streaks on the windows. A fresh towel and another wipe and I was streak free. I will order the bug and wheel bottles next, I'm sold!!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan St Clair

customer_reviews.title: No more waterspots!
customer_reviews.text: I live in the dusty southwest where our water is hard. Washing the car with a hose was always a race against time to get the car dried off before the hard water would dry and leave spots all over the car, not to mention the dust while washing outside. Now I can wash the car in my garage at my own pace. It smells wonderful, gets the car clean, doesn't scratch and leaves a nice coating of smooth wax to boot! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: James M. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product
customer_reviews.text: Living in an RV, I needed something to help keep it clean -- Wash Wax All does all that exceedingly well! First, it is so easy to use either dry or wet with the only effort required being elbow grease! It polishes out to a lovely shiny finish and keeps the RV looking much younger than the actual 10 years! I have used it inside on counters and dash panels and shower doors and more and find that every use finishes with the same wonderful result! I can't believe that all cars & RV's don't automatically come with this product! I only wish I had bought the package with the long pole applicator!
customer_reviews.author: Wildwood Corgis

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: works really well. streak free but for me on a black car it must be done in a cool surface or it will streak a bit. my white car and bronze colored cars are not as pickey. when used in my black jeep in the shade it looks great!! works pretty well on interior as well. great communication from owner as well as I had some questions and go quick replies. for rain spots and pollen and light dirt works great. I would not use it for anything more than that but that's just me being anal about things.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding products, perfect for water restrictions, cleaning and shine
customer_reviews.text: Would not have believed the results until first hand review right in front of my eyes, and on multiple family vehicles ranging from couple months to couple decades old. The deep cleaning and shine looks as if I spent several hours washing and waxing with buffers and polishers on each vehicle, that only took 30 - 45 minutes to accomplish. With water restrictions, and a Home Owners Association always on patrol for maintenance, washing/waxing our cars, this is truly an Outstanding product(s). Will be purchasing more for family and friends as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: RADAR

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about cars, but thanks to hours of research, amazon, reviews and Youtube it lead me to this product. I recently got as a Mother's Day gift as close to as a new car I will ever have 2019 Ford Flex. I wanted to keep this car looking great for as long as I can. I did my research read the reviews, and I had a gift card for Amazon so I made my purchase. I KID YOU NOT WHEN I SAY THE CAR LOOKS BETTER NOW AFTER USING THIS PRODUCT. Would I purchase this product again, Would I recommend this product, YES, YES!! I'm going to try out their Leather Soap and Leather Care next. ar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Spots be GONE!
customer_reviews.text: What a great product! Full time RVers we visit a lot of campgrounds. We recently were in a KOA in the Santa Paula area. The water there was off the chart hard! Seriously, I had to dilute it 50/50 with distilled water just to get a reasonable reading on the test strip. Washing the coach, we had water spots like I have never seen before. WashWax All to the rescue!!! I was concerned that I would spend the rest of my life getting those spot off. Not the case. A couple of hours later and not only were the spots gone but the coach hasn’t looked better. Super happy with how this product performs.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Temple

customer_reviews.title: Really works as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can wash my car without water what!!!! Oh hell yes you can!!! 08 pos Suzuki hasn’t had a bath since I bought it 2 years ago used and abused! One spray one wipe instantly clean and shiny! No water nothing but the stuff in box! I can’t put enough !!! To anyone who washes there own stuff!!! You can clean it all with this seriously amazing simply amazing I just ordered another kit for the wife’s Audi . Include a photo of half this hood on the turd truck and another of RR
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable! Saved me a lot of time and effort!
customer_reviews.text: This product is unbelievable! It saved me a lot of time for washing 2 cars. It usually takes me 4 plus hours for washing and waxing 2 SUVs. Now with this product, it only takes me a little bit over an hour to finish 2 cars. After cleaning/washing the car with this waterless car wash, the paint feels smooth and feels like you have just waxed it. Most importantly, it does not scratch the paint at all (need to follow the instructions of course). Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I Am Impressed
customer_reviews.text: What impressed me is unlike other waxes, when the car gets dirty I can literally hose off the grime. Just general grime, not like a years worth. The wax I used before was easy to apply in the hot sun, etc. However, I have to park under an oak tree, the pollen covers the car, and the sun bakes it on. Therefore I use to have to wash the car more often. This Aero, again just hose it off, or if it rains same thing. Looks like I washed and waxed the car, not something I look forward to doing.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by this Wash Wax All. For $35 you get a gallon jug, 16oz spray bottle full of product and 4 nice microfiber towels. Beats paying $15-20 for a good quick detailed. I just used it 4 days ago but it leaves a nice smooth shiny finish like a fresh wax job. It’s very hydrophobic, I used it ok my windshield and it works like rainx. No streaming or hazing either. I wouldn’t recommend using it in direct sunlight on a hot day because it will dry pretty quickly if not using water with it.
customer_reviews.author: chase lease

customer_reviews.title: Clean as a Whistle (wait, are whistles really that clean?)
customer_reviews.text: This car wash kit is great. I used it on my car after I drove across the country and it made it look brand new again. It easily wiped off all the dust and dead bugs. And there were A LOT of dead bugs. A wing here. Leg there. Part of a shell stuck here. It looked like I was just driving through hoards of bugs. You know the stats that say like, "all the world's bugs weigh 800x more than earth itself"? Well it was probably only 799x more after my drive. And this cleaner got them all off. Pretty impressive really.
customer_reviews.author: Drake Paul

customer_reviews.title: A Terrific Product!
customer_reviews.text: I remembered this product when some folks came into this campground and were using it to clean their motorhome -- I had used it about 10 years ago when I was dating a small aircraft pilot, as he used this product to clean his airplane. Got on Amazon right away and ordered the kit. Ohmygosh! What a JOY it was to finally get 2,000 miles worth of dead bugs off the front of my Class C Winnebago, not to mention the front of my car. Easy to use and a little bit goes a long way. I have since shared some with my campground friends and told them to use it and then buy some more!
customer_reviews.author: KC Beard

customer_reviews.title: Polish All is Great Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered WashWax All on the recommendation of a friend who does his motorcoach with it and loves it. I started to do my white Ford F150 with it, and I got to some dark water stains on the plastic cowl around the grille and headlights that the product would not touch. I went to the website and wrote an email to Brian at Aero Cosmetics about the problem. He diagnosed the problem and sent me some Polish All. Man, what a difference, The product goes on with a cotton cloth, polishes off before it's dry, and then gets buffed over with WashWax All. It looks better than the day it came off the lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Craw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use product
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product and it seems to polish and shine very effortlessly.Using it on a filon finish on an RV. I did have to clean first with a RV wash that removes black streaks first .This supplier also appears to carry some products that are listed in the papers enclosed that would address this and other issues with products that they have . 2/2020 reordered this product. Have yet to find anything that is better. Does a great job of cleaning the bugs off my motorcycle .I have used it on the windshield,paint and chrome. I prefer this stuff on my other vehicles mostly because it is so much faster and easier than traditional wax.
customer_reviews.author: whiskers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Wash Wax All waterless carwash kit
customer_reviews.text: Good price, good quality waterless kit Wash and Wax All, which includes 1 spray bottle, 1 big refill bottle, and several good micro fiber I use this to do quick waterless wash for my Tesla Model 3. One wash takes about half the spray bottle. The result is awesome clean on both paint and windows. The gloss is nice too. This amazing cleaner can be used to clean car interior, and home ovens as well
customer_reviews.author: K. Tran

customer_reviews.title: easy to use. Cloths no good.
customer_reviews.text: Used on my new Tesla 3 after Suntek & professional waxing to keep it pretty for Wisconsin messy winters. Looked great & leaves nice shine. But next day after going on slightly wet roads, used moistened included cloth to wipe off leaf debris. Now I can't get the leaf debris out of the cloth without using a tweezers to pick it out. Picture shows after hand cleaning & machine washing twice. Don't recommend these cloths.
customer_reviews.author: drpearl

customer_reviews.title: Missing brush/scrubber
customer_reviews.text: I bought this first last year with complete kit and works very well with their small scrubber, but the second time I ordered this kit, the scrubber is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: by far the worst
customer_reviews.text: directions were terrible . brand new hellcat. had to take to local detailer to fix. was my 5th charger in ten years never buy this crap. how did all the good reviews get on her. small bottle was broke and liquid everywhere. geeze.
customer_reviews.author: gldtobfl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product, Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to use, and does exactly what it claims. You can use this on almost every part of the car. It removes the dirt and leaves it looking and feeling freshly waxed. I'm usually very skeptical about "all-in-one" products, but it was hard to ignore the bazillion 5-star reviews this product has received on Amazon. This stuff did not disappoint. I washed/waxed our Hyundai Sonata (4-Door Sedan) and a Mercedes GL450 (7- Passenger SUV) in just over one hour and never got the hose out. I think I can get a dozen washes out of this order, so it's a very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: As easy as wiping it on
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I have no intention of using it as a waterless cleaning product. I wanted something that was durable, easy to use and provided excellent protection. I haven't had it long enough to comment on durable but I can sing its praises for its ease of use and high beading shine it provides. Wash, spray it on as you dry and voila, a beautiful shine. The amount I use to completely wax my small Honda Fit gives me reason to believe it's also an excellent deal financially. I'm a happy man.
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Meek

customer_reviews.title: Make it look better than when you bought it.
customer_reviews.text: There was a lot of different wash and wax products to choose from. I selected the Aero Cosmetics Wet and Water based on size/quantity and reviews. I received it in 2 days and used it immediately. This stuff works great and was easily to apply with the spray bottle and just as easy to wipe off while drying. It was also nice to have the 4 microfiber towels that came with the deal. The end result exceeded my expectations. This is the best my truck ever looked. Next is my Rv. I expect that it will make it look better than when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Derek Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your other spray detailers!
customer_reviews.text: This is the spray wax to end all spray waxes! I don't know what kind of black magic chemistry Aero cosmetics used on this but it's something else! It outperforms all of the competition. It delivers a glossier shine, a beat hydrophobic coat and lasts twice as long for about half of what chemical guys, adams and meguiars can offer. I've tried all of those companies spray waxes and spray detailers and this one takes the cake by a long shot. Pretty simple to use, spray on wipe off. No streaks left, only shine! The gallon jug is at an amazing price, this is on my subscribe and save list, I use it on all my cars!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Grabenhorst

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal on a Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Aero Cosmetics Waterless wash to try since another brand was unavailable. I'm extremely happy and satisfied with this companies product that I purchased many other their other products and am equally happy. Leather Care, Rubber Care are also both fantastic. I'm also trying the degreaser and polish as soon as they arrive. Aero Cosmetics is my new "Go to" car care product line.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when i first saw it being used on a You tube video. i saw so many other videos before i bought the product. but i used it on my Tesla Model 3, which i never washed, only cleaned it with a hose. i was shocked at how great this product worked. just fantastic. Thank you, my car looks like the day i took delivery almost a year to the day. i will definitely not wait that long to clean my car, now i have this fabulous product. Thanks Again for creating this. GZ, NJ
customer_reviews.author: mzac

customer_reviews.title: Waterless wash and wax...THE BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I can wash my vehicles without the mess of lots of water. Looks great once you get it finished. Did my entire RAM truck in about 15 minutes. Will work as long as your car has a good paint job already. If your paint is dull or has scratches, you must fix those things first with a different type of product. This stuff works on paint jobs that are good and don't have lots of scratches as it is meant to clean, not restore old paint and scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan O'Conner

product_meta.title: Wet or Waterless Car Wash Wax Kit 144 Ounces. Aircraft Quality for Your Car, RV, Boat, Motorcycle. The Best Wash Wax. Anywhere, Anytime, Home, Office, School, Garage, Parking Lots.
feature_bullets: SIMPLY THE BEST WATERLESS CAR WASH. Gently Cleans and Protects while leaving a Non-Stick UV Protective Coating on All Vehicle surfaces. Just Spray on and Wipe Dry. Wash and Wax Anywhere, Anytime, Parking Lots, Garages, Work, School, Apartments, RV Parks, and more. Use as a Waterless Wash or Wax as You Dry your just washed Vehicle. 144oz will Waterless Wash up to 36 cars or Wax As You Dry 57 cars.

Highly performance Aircraft Quality Wax for your Car, Boat, and RV. ONCE YOU SEE THE DIFFERENCE YOU WILL NEVER USE AUTOMOTIVE PRODUCTS AGAIN! Used by Air Force One, Marine One, The Military, Airlines, Corporate and private aircraft owners around the world for over 32 years. This is a high quality easy to use product.

Water Based - Alcohol & Ammonia Free. Our plant-based Eco-friendly formula is biodegradable and Safe on ALL surfaces both Inside and Out. Meets Boeing Aircraft (D6-17487P, D6-7127M), Airbus Industries (09-00-002), and McDonnell Douglass CDS #1 cleaning specifications. Also, Human Friendly, NO eye or skin irritation like some other automotive products
Kit includes 1 full gallon of Wash Wax ALL, 1 full 16 oz spray bottle of Wash Wax ALL, 4 Microfiber Towels (16 in x 16 in), a Product Guide, and How to Use Guide.

⚠️ Note: Understand that this is a Wash and Wax Product. Wax will protect and enhance the shine you currently have. If you have dull, oxidized, or scratched finish you will need a Polish to address those issues. WAX IS FOR PROTECTION; POLISH IS FOR REPAIR. Our polish is called Polish ALL and is also available on Amazon. 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE. If you are not getting 5-star results out of this 5-star product, please give us a chance to correct the issue. Please contact us.
